

### Load required library

```{r loading packages}
library(tidyverse) 
library(lubridate)  
library(ggplot2) 
```

### set working directory
```{r set working directory to documents where data is saved}
getwd()
setwd("/Users/anil/Documents/")
```

### load dataset

```{r load dataset}
tripdata <- read_csv('tripdata_master.csv')
```

### Inspect the new table that has been created

```{r Inspect the data}
head(tripdata)
colnames(tripdata)
nrow(tripdata)
dim(tripdata)
str(tripdata)
summary(tripdata)
```

# check for values in columns
```{r check column values}
table(tripdata$rider_type)
table(tripdata$rideable_type)
```
